Definition.Name: is_object_in_boundary

Definition.Name: player_recently_damaged
Definition.Description: Checks if a player has been damaged by the specified assailant.
Definition.Remarks: Remains true until the victim's shields begin recharging.

Definition.Name: compare_teams
Definition.Description: Compares two teams.

Definition.Name: timer_is_zero
Definition.Description: Checks whether a timer's value is zero.

Definition.Name: object_is_type
Definition.Description: Checks if an object matches a multiplayer object type.

Definition.Name: team_has_players
Definition.Description: Determines whether the given team has players (including those who have switched teams or left the game).

Definition.Name: object_is_out_of_bounds
Definition.Description: Checks whether an object is out of the playing field.

Definition.Remarks: This condition is unused in Halo 4.

Definition.Name: player_assisted
Definition.Description: Determines whether a player has assisted in killing a player.

Definition.Name: object_matches_filter
Definition.Description: Checks if an object matches a certain filter (including Forge labels).

Definition.Name: player_is_not_respawning
Definition.Description: Returns false if a player is currently respawning.
Definition.Remarks: This will return true during the initial loadout screen.

Definition.Name: is_armor_ability_being_used
Definition.Description: Returns true if the specified armor ability is currently being used.

Definition.Name: player_is_spartan

Definition.Name: player_is_elite
Definition.Description: Determines whether a player is an Elite.
Definition.Remarks: Useless in Halo 4, but official gametypes use this condition.

Definition.Name: player_is_monitor
Definition.Description: Determines whether a player is a Monitor.

Definition.Remarks: Unknown; might be "Is In Matchmaking?" since the offline achievement glitch in Halo: Reach was patched via Megalo.

Definition.Name: vehicle_hijacked
Definition.Description: Returns true if the targeted vehicle was hijacked regardless of seat.
Definition.Remarks:
Remains true for about 3 seconds after being hijacked. Does not include tank or Mantis boarding. Warthog turrets are considered a vehicle on its own so be sure to factor them in when dealing with a Warthog.
Very similar to other conditions related to vehicle hijacking. The difference has yet to be identified.
